message.body: Wait I forget. What do I do about spikette
Turn white lights on in the morning. Around 7-9... Turn lights reds around 7 at night
Lmao just seen you said "spikette"... but yea white lights are one white bulb (double bulbed pair) and the bar light. Only one red light.
Ohhh.... you can adjust the thermostat. At night we put it at 72. But in the morning raise It to 76. Just gotta hit the up and down arrows
Is there a hose in the yard?
Yea... under kitchen window... for what?

The is also a broom and dust pan in the yard to pick up some poop. Just bring out big trash bag and sweep it up. You can then leave the trash bag outside at the other end of the yard bec he never poops that end
If you run the hose, the drain in the yard is on the other side of the steps. And there is bleach under the sink (of course dog cannot be out while you do that)
Good. On our way back now
